-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Mapping between Aeson's JSON and Bson objects.
--   
--   This package lets you convert between Aeson's JSON and Bson objects.
@package aeson-bson
@version 0.3.0

module Data.Aeson.Bson
toAeson :: Document -> Object
aesonifyValue :: Value -> Value
toBson :: Object -> Document
bsonifyValue :: Value -> Value
instance ToJSON Document
instance ToJSON Value
